Review_Text: Bouzgarrou and Jenkoe sign a beautiful documentary, elegiac, an ode to the last hillbillies. But this portrait, in spite of its bewitching, poetic sides, this frenzy of childish freedom as in its moments when the rancid morality of a dying world is asserted, does not really manage to discover the world it tracks... As if finally, there was already nothing left to chase in the hills of Kentucky.
